department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for a range of communications analysis  equipment and services in respect of articles of interest in order to support Government of Canada  initiatives. DND objective is to provide its personnel with the ability to analyze articles of interest  worldwide and transmit that information to a location of their choice to obtain this objective, the  contractor must provide a wide range of equipment and related professional services to meet specific  DND requirements.
tags: Radio Transceivers and Transmitter-Receivers, Portable (Except Airborne)
full_summary:
### Tender Notice
#### Request for Proposal - Communication Analysis Equipment and Services
????-????-WSIBC was released by the Government of Canada through **Public Works and Government Services Canada** via PW-PRB-20223144. The notice was published on December 2, 2022, and the tender deadline is December 19, 2022, at 14:00:00.

#### Project Background
The Department of National Defence (DND) aims to analyze articles of interest worldwide and transmit information to a desired location. To achieve this objective, the contractor must provide various communication analysis equipment and services that meet specific requirements.

#### Tender Details
- **Reference Number**: W1234-20223/A
- **Solicitation Number**: W6399-23DB23/A
- **Category**: Goods and Services (procurement category: GD)
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
- **Trade Agreements**: The trade agreements applicable for this tender include CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK.
- **Delivery Location**: Ontario (except NCR)
- **End User**: Department of National Defence
- **Language**: Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Important Notes
- Only suppliers who are on the permanent list or who meet the qualification requirements can submit bids.
- Suppliers should refer to the W3048-20KH37 supply arrangement.
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- Canada will not extend the RFP to provide additional time for bidders to qualify for the supply arrangement and submit a proposal for the RFP. 

#### Point of Contact
Herb Choquette
(613) 449-8446
herb.choquette@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
86 Clarence Street, 2nd floor
Kingston, Ontario
K7L 1X3

### How to Get Further Information
Contact information will be necessary to arrange a meeting at Kingston Procurement, 86 Clarence Street, 2nd floor, Kingston, Ontario. Supplier referrals should be made to **Travaux publics et Services gouvernementaux Canada** (Public Works and Government Services). Georgia, Kara, is the main contact for supplier outreach at her phone number  (804) 732-2906).??-????-WSIBC number is
